Carbon copy (CC)

Blind Carbon Copy email

Emitere factura in SmartBill: Poti adauga o adresa de email la care doresti sa se trimita o copie prin BCC. Daca doresti mai multe, acestea trebuie separate prin virgula. Adresele de email trecute aici nu vor fi vizibile in antetul mesajului precum cele de la campul anterior (CC).
Generate SmartBill Invoice: You can add an email address to which you want to send a copy via BCC. If you want more addresses, they must be separated by commas. Email addresses put here will not be visible in the header of the email message as in the previous field (CC).
Message content

Emitere factura in SmartBill: Factura SmartBill poate fi emisa din sectiunea Orders sau din sectiunea Invoices. Alege 'Nu' pentru a emite factura din Orders sau 'Da' pentru a emite factura din Invoices.
Generate SmartBill Invoice: The SmartBill invoice can be issued from the Orders section or the Invoices section. Select 'No' to issue the invoice from Orders or 'Yes' to issue it from Invoices.

Emitere factura in SmartBill:
Aici poti sa iti personalizezi mesajul pe care doresti sa-l trimiti catre client. Poti sa iti personalizezi mesajul folosind informatia existenta pe facturi, disponibila in contul SmartBill Cloud -> Configurare -> Email, precum :
  • #tip document#
  • #link document#
  • #serie numar document#
  • #total document#
  • #data emiterii#
  • #data scadentei#
  • #mentiune#
  • #nume client#
  • #persoana contact#
Pentru a folosi aceste variabile, ai nevoie sa le copiezi/inserezi incepand de la caracterul diez de inceput (#) pana la caracterul diez de final (#). ]]>
Generate SmartBill Invoice:
Here you can personalize the message that you wish to send to the client. You can use the following information, available in your SmartBill Cloud interface -> Configuration -> Email :
  • #tip document#
  • #link document#
  • #serie numar document#
  • #total document#
  • #data emiterii#
  • #data scadentei#
  • #mentiune#
  • #nume client#
  • #persoana contact#
In order to use these variables, you need to copy and paste them in the message body of the email (including the hash symbol). ]]>
